00054 Globals *g;

00057 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058 // Target
00059 
00060 Target::Target() {
00061     arch = "x86-64";
00062     cpu = "nehalem";
00063     isa = SSE4;
00064     nativeVectorWidth = 4;
00065     vectorWidth = 4;
00066 }
00067 
00068 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00069 // Opt
00070 
00071 Opt::Opt() {
00072     level = 1;
00073     fastMath = false;
00074     disableBlendedMaskedStores = false;
00075     disableCoherentControlFlow = false;
00076     disableUniformControlFlow = false;
00077     disableGatherScatterOptimizations = false;
00078     disableMaskedStoreToStore = false;
00079     disableGatherScatterFlattening = false;
00080     disableUniformMemoryOptimizations = false;
00081     disableMaskedStoreOptimizations = false;
00082 }

00087 Globals::Globals() {
00088     mathLib = Globals::Math_ISPC;
00089 
00090     includeStdlib = true;
00091     runCPP = true;
00092     debugPrint = false;
00093     disableWarnings = false;
00094     emitPerfWarnings = true;
00095     emitInstrumentation = false;
00096     generateDebuggingSymbols = false;
00097 
00098     ctx = new llvm::LLVMContext;
00099 
00100 #ifdef ISPC_IS_WINDOWS
00101     _getcwd(currentDirectory, sizeof(currentDirectory));
00102 #else
00103     getcwd(currentDirectory, sizeof(currentDirectory));
00104 #endif
00105 }

00113 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00114 // SourcePos
00115 
00116 SourcePos::SourcePos(const char *n, int l, int c) {
00117     name = n ? n : m->module->getModuleIdentifier().c_str();
00118     first_line = last_line = l;
00119     first_column = last_column = c;
00120 }
00121 
00122 llvm::DIFile SourcePos::GetDIFile() const {
00123 #ifdef LLVM_2_8
00124     return llvm::DIFile();
00125 #else
00126     std::string directory, filename;
00127     GetDirectoryAndFileName(g->currentDirectory, name, &directory, &filename);
00128     return m->diBuilder->createFile(filename, directory);
00129 #endif // LLVM_2_8
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 void
00134 SourcePos::Print() const { 
00135     printf(" @ [%s:%d.%d - %d.%d] ", name, first_line, first_column,
00136            last_line, last_column); 
00137 }
